/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by lush greenery, with trees and shrubs adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the distance, majestic mountains rise against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the mountains and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and shrubs contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall scene is a harmonious blend of urban life and natural beauty.
